name: RAY Video Streamlining
overview:
It provides Patented Video Compression , therefore saves Host Space by 95% and allows more Information to Travel over a Spectrum of BandWidth. A start-up Company that went Public in 08/2011. I own Google Stock and I certainly hope that I do all that I can to make this Company even more sucessful as a non-employee. The symbol is R,A,Y,S, and it will be acquired by anyone of 10 Companies that need to acquire a competitive edge. The Company is still cheap now as an Acquisition. In the Future it may not be so Cheap. My Name is John H. Riggin, I am at jrlutz614@msn.com

Thank-You
